description: Listed Building Consent in connection with the installation of two spotlights in the lightwell at the front of building to illuminate the elevation facing onto Charterhouse Square.
decision_conditions: REASON: The two spotlights installed in the front lightwell and the illumination of the building are considered to be harmful to the significance of this Grade II listed building and the setting of nearby listed buildings and the character and appearance of the Charterhouse Conservation Area contrary to Policies HE7, HE9 and HE10 of PPS5: Planning for the Historic Environment; Strategic Policy 9 of the Islington Core Strategy 2011, Strategic Policy 12.3 and 12.4 of The Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002, The Islington Conservation Area Design Guidelines 2002 and the advice contained in English Heritage publication External lighting for historic buildings 2007.
